comment.label_en:
Select the user groups and / or individual users who will
be able to read this document when it is issued:

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in('cd_clinical_doc_readers', 'cd_non_clinical_doc_readers', 'cd_quality_doc_readers', 'cd_regulatory_doc_readers') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in ('cd_clinical_doc_readers', 'cd_non_clinical_doc_readers', 'cd_quality_doc_readers', 'cd_regulatory_doc_readers') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name in('cd_clinical_doc_readers', 'cd_non_clinical_doc_readers', 'cd_quality_doc_readers', 'cd_regulatory_doc_readers')
